### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Chest at position(x=40.5, y=-80.5)
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=0.5, y=2.5) and chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
-  Make sure that the pipe connections are properly aligned and not blocked by other entities.

### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure that the burner mining drills have a sufficient fuel supply before starting the mining process.
-  Make sure that the mining drills are properly placed and aligned with the resource deposits.

### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure that the furnaces have a sufficient fuel supply and ingredients before starting the smelting process.
-  Make sure that the furnaces are properly placed and aligned with the resource deposits and chests.

### Errors when using offshore pumps and boilers
-  Ensure that the offshore pumps and boilers are properly connected and have a sufficient fuel supply before starting the steam generation process.
-  Make sure that the steam engine is properly connected to the boiler and offshore pump.
